Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils

This package contains various utility classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AdapterUtils Utility class taking advantage of Transformations.
ArrayUtils Utility class with utilities for arrays.
Bo2UtilsEnvironment Runtime environment for Bo2Utils.
CollectionUtils Utility class with utilities for arrays.
ConditionUtils Utilities for condition checks.
CryptUtils Utilities for encryption, hashing etc.
DateUtils Utilities for dates
Debug This utility class provides useful static methods for debugging.
Defaults  
DependencyGraphs Utilities for dependency graphs.
EnhancedProperties Properties extension that is able to import another properties file and also support property values that embed the values of other properties declared on the same or imported file.
ExceptionUtils Utilities relevant with Exceptions.
GenericsUtils Utils about generics.
IllegalCharacterFilter Provides a defense mechanism to disallow the insertion of inappropriate characters to database tables.
ImportingProperties Properties extension that may load properties from multiple files that import eachother.
JavaBeanUtils Javabean utils offers utilities that use the facilities provided by the Apache commons BeanUtils project.
MatchingUtils Utility class that provides various methods that match elements of different collections.
NumberUtils Utilities relevant with Numbers.
ReflectionUtils Utilities relevant with the java reflection API.
RegexUtils Utilities for use of regular expressions.
Register Register lets register key-value pairs only once per key.
SelectionUtils Utility class with methods that select items from Collections.
StreamUtils Utilities about streams.
StringConstants String constants.
StringUtils Utilities for string operations.
SystemUtils System utilities.
TemplateUtils Utility class that provides utilities that make it easier to modify template files.
TimeUtils Time related utilities.
TokenUtils Utilities for splitting strings into tokens.
Utils Utility class.
VariableDefinitionFactory Factory for VariableDefinition objects.
ZipUtils Utilities for zip
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils Description

This package contains various utility classes.
The utility classes of this package are not specific to the Bo2 project, but can be used independently anywhere.
